sourcesContent:
import {useState} from "react"; const AverageTable =({ stocks })=>{ const billion = 1000000000 const [averageData, setAverageData] = useState({}) let numStocks = 0 let averagePE = 0; let averageEnterpriseValue = 0; let averageMarketCap = 0; let averageRoe = 0; let averageEnterpriseToRev = 0; let averageEnterpriseToEbitda = 0; let averageProfitMargins = 0; stocks.map((stock) => { averagePE += stock.forwardPE averageEnterpriseToEbitda += stock.enterpriseToEbitda averageEnterpriseToRev += stock.enterpriseToRev averageMarketCap += stock.marketCap averageRoe += stock.roe averageEnterpriseValue += stock.enterpriseValue averageProfitMargins += stock.profitMargins numStocks+=1 }) setAverageData({forwardPE:(averagePE/numStocks), enterpriseValue:(averageEnterpriseValue/numStocks), enterpriseToRev:(averageEnterpriseToRev/numStocks), enterpriseToEbitda:(averageEnterpriseToEbitda/numStocks), marketCap:(averageMarketCap/numStocks), profitMargins:(averageProfitMargins/numStocks), roe:(averageRoe/numStocks)}) return(
Market Cap Enterprise Value Forward PE Enterprise to Revenue Enterprise to EBITDA Profit Margins ROE
{ (averageData.marketCap /billion).toFixed(2)} { (averageData.enterpriseValue/billion).toFixed(2) } { averageData.forwardPE } { averageData.enterpriseToRev } { averageData.enterpriseToEbitda } { averageData.profitMargins } { averageData.roe }
); } export default AverageTable
